Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the extent of the editing done to the images of vandalized street signs.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the images were edited.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the images were edited without providing substantial evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by the Panadura urban council chairman and the Panadura South Police, who stated that the Tamil-language street name sign was actually vandalized, contradicting the claim.
